title: Petit Brot - Cold Press - Raw - Eco
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Western, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Organic raw food cafe and takeaway shop specializing in cold-pressed juices made to order and superfood/green smoothies. Offers daily lunch menus, savory and sweet snacks. The shop section includes house-made raw crackers, granola, pates, veg milks, desserts, and other raw vegan goodies. Grows its own wheatgrass, micro-greens, and sprouts that are used in drinks and dishes. Uses eco-friendly, compostable packaging. Cozy space created using bio-construction.
